text.config.lcoindb-config.option.authen:
Whether to automatically authenticate on any server.
(If this is disabled no automatic authentication will happen.)
text.config.lcoindb-config.option.truste:
Authentication will only be automatically done on these servers.
This is just for convenience.
text.config.lcoindb-config.option.apiUrl:
The url of the api. 
 Don't change if you don't know what you are doing!
